title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for row[0]
description:
When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0', the result set is either incorrect or returns null.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Observed Behavior:
The first result record returned when previewing the data set is incorrect.

Expected Behavior:
As the developer mentioned, 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data is fetched. Thus, 'row[0]' should not be used as a filter expression.
OB: The first result record returned when previewing the data set is incorrect.
EB: As the developer mentioned, 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data is fetched. Thus, 'row[0]' should not be used as a filter expression.
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab.
